author: Jan Greenland
method: The night before you want to make the sandwiches, cover the pat of butter in rose petals, wrap in foil and leave in a cool place. To make the sandwiches, spread the slices of bread with the rose butter, top with a layer of rose petals and sprinkle with caster sugar. Top with another slice of bread and cut into four. Serve with a pot of Earl Grey tea.
